title: For Tomorrow
creator_credit: Lilias Fraser, Norman Castle, Conzinc Riotinto of Australia and Fraser Castle Productions
brief_description: Conzinc Riotinto sends geologists to Bougainville to search for minerals. The rugged mountainous jungle country, heat and humidity makes it an arduous task. They establish a drilling site where much sampling, testing and drilling of the area is carried out to evaluate the location.
